Articles.Content:
Attempting to launch some stuff to my station today, I messed up the staging and tried to revert to fix it. However, when I pressed the button, the revert GUI was bugged, and this error spammed in the output_log. Also, the MissingFieldException occurs constantly whenever I am in flight. Any support helps!

Not mod related:

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object at PauseMenu.drawRevertOptions () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at MultiOptionDialog.drawContent (Int32 id) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at UnityEngine.GUILayout+LayoutedWindow.DoWindow (Int32 windowID) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at UnityEngine.GUI.CallWindowDelegate (UnityEngine.WindowFunction func, Int32 id, UnityEngine.GUISkin _skin, Int32 forceRect, Single width, Single height, UnityEngine.GUIStyle style) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

(Filename: Line: -1)

MissingFieldException: Field '.TemperatureGagueSystem.showGagues' not found.

Hi theon502, are there any other symptoms of this? And can you please upload the full contents of your log to a file site or a paste site the next time this happens.

Also please see if the partial workaround here helps you.

Edited November 14, 2015 by sal_vager

MissingFieldException: Field '.TemperatureGagueSystem.showGagues' not found.

seems to be caused by KerbalKatz's disable tempgagues mod. took me a while to find it when the clue was right there in the name.
